---
title: "US Gas Prices"
subtitle: "Exploring US Gas Prices Over Time"
format: html
---

```{r}


# Load libraries (not install)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)

# Load dataset
weekly_gas_prices <- readr::read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-07-01/weekly_gas_prices.csv"
)

# Plot
weekly_gas_prices |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = price)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue") +
  labs(
    title = "Weekly U.S. Gas Prices (1990â€“2025)",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Price (USD per gallon)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()


```
